meanings.definition: A deduction from the usual cost of something.
meanings.sent1: The store offered discounts on all items during the sale.
meanings.sent2: I always look for discounts before making a purchase.
meanings.sent3: The discount on the shoes made them practically free!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was a discount on the gloomy day.
meanings.sent5: The discount sign outside the store caught my attention immediately.

meanings.definition: To deduct an amount from the usual price.
meanings.sent1: She discounts the final price for loyal customers.
meanings.sent2: Remember to discount the coupon value from the total.
meanings.sent3: He tried to discount the bill, but it was already paid in full.
meanings.sent4: The teacher discounts points for late submissions.
meanings.sent5: Discounting the shipping fee, the total cost was reasonable.

meanings.sent1: The online store offered a discount on all electronics.
meanings.sent2: The discount at the restaurant made the meal affordable.
meanings.sent3: The discount on the vacation package was too good to resist.
meanings.sent4: The discount felt like a gift from the store.
meanings.sent5: The discount brought a smile to her face.
